column1: Marketing Analytics and Data Science MSc
column5: How to generate customer insights based on advanced data engineering and analytics?In the MSc Marketing - Marketing Analytics and Data Science (MADS) profile, you will be educated and trained thoroughly on methods that allow you to analyze and model (secondary, big) data to track the marketing performance of the firm and generate new customer insights. The information and insights generated by the MADS profile are used as a basis for making research-based strategic and tactical marketing decisions.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
